rabbit-head.body:
# ${1:title}

subtitle
:  ${2:subtitle}

author
:   井川泰一

theme
:   rabbit

hugo-head.body:
+++
  title = "${1:title}"
  tags = [${2:tags}]
  date = `date`"@date$``{3:2016-06-25T11:20:56+09:00}"
  banner = "banners/${4:banner.png}"
  draft = "true"
  +++
'variables':
  'date': '''
    require moment
    moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD")
  '''
